output.mean_keff: grep 'best estimate system k-eff' *.out | head -1 | tr -s '[:space:]' | cut -d ' ' -f7
output.sigma_keff: grep 'best estimate system k-eff' *.out | head -1 | tr -s '[:space:]' | cut -d ' ' -f11
output.mean_E_lethargy: grep 'Energy of average lethargy of Fission' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $7}' 2>/dev/null
output.sigma_E_lethargy: grep 'Energy of average lethargy of Fission' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $10}' 2>/dev/null
output.mean_free_path: grep 'system mean free path' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $5}' 2>/dev/null
output.sigma_free_path: grep 'system mean free path' *.out | head -1 | awk '{print $8}' 2>/dev/null
